mapper.select: select EMP_NO from STDNT_ACAVSR_INFO where STDNT_NO = #{stdnt_no} and TKCG_YN = 'Y' order by STDNT_NO desc
select EMP_NO, EMP_FLNM from EMP_INFO where MNG_AUTHRT = 'C' order by EMP_NO desc
select * from VIEW_DSCSN_APLY where MNG_AUTHRT = 'C' and (STTS_CD = '미승인' OR STTS_CD = '승인') order by APLY_SN desc
select * from DSCSN_APLY where EMP_NO = #{emp_no} and (STTS_CD = '미승인' OR STTS_CD = '승인') order by APLY_SN desc

select * from VIEW_DSCSN_APLY where STDNT_NO = #{stdnt_no}
and now() > RSVT_DT and (STTS_CD = '취소' or STTS_CD = '완료')
and RSVT_DT >= now() and STTS_CD = '미승인'
and RSVT_DT >= now() and STTS_CD = '승인'
and RSVT_DT >= now() and (STTS_CD = '취소' or STTS_CD = '완료')
order by APLY_SN desc
mapper.insert: insert into DSCSN_APLY (aply_sn, stdnt_no, emp_no, stts_cd, plc, hr_se, rsvt_dt, aply_dt, dscsn_mthd, dscsn_knd) values ('0', #{stdnt_no}, #{emp_no}, #{stts_cd}, #{plc}, #{hr_se}, #{rsvt_dt}, now(), #{dscsn_mthd}, #{dscsn_knd})
